title: EBSI Verifiable Authorisation
description: Schema of an EBSI Verifiable Authorisation

credentialSubject.description: Defines additional information about the subject that is described by the Verifiable Authorisation

id.description: Defines the DID of the subject that is described by the Verifiable Attestation

familyName.description: Defines current family name(s) of the credential subject

firstName.description: Defines current first name(s) of the credential subject

dateOfBirth.description: Defines date of birth of the credential subject

personalIdentifier.description: Defines the unique national identifier of the credential subject (constructed by the sending Member State in accordance with the technical specifications for the purposes of cross-border identification and which is as persistent as possible in time)

nameAndFamilyNameAtBirth.description: Defines the first and the family name(s) of the credential subject at the time of their birth

placeOfBirth.description: Defines the place where the credential subjectis born

currentAddress.description: Defines the current address of the credential subject

gender.description: Defines the gender of the credential subject
